message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,350,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious offer.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but the value of this product to you is undeniable. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is a fair compromise.

I'm still not convinced that $1,275,000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,225,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll be getting out of this product.
